ParamAuthorName.Description: Added as a tag called 'Owner' to every resource for easier management.

ParamDatabaseInstanceType.Description: Instance type for the DB instance (leave blank if using Snapshot)

ParamDatabaseName.Description: Name of the database created in the cluster (leave blank if using Snapshot)

ParamDatabaseUsername.Description: Database admin username (leave blank if using Snapshot)

ParamDatabasePassword.Description: Database admin password (leave blank if using Snapshot)
ParamDatabasePassword.ConstraintDescription: Can contain only alphanumeric characters and must be at least 8 characters long.

ParamDatabaseBackupRetentionPeriod.Description: Number of days DB backups are retained (leave blank if using Snapshot)

ParamNetworkStackName.Description: Name of an active CloudFormation stack that contains the networking / VPC resources

ParamDBReadReplica.Description: Launch a read replica for DB? (leave blank if using Snapshot)

ParamDBNotificationEmail.Description: Email address to send DB notifcations to

ParamDBSnapshotArn.Description: ARN of the RDS Snapshot to create the cluster from (leave blank if creating new DB)

ParamKMSKeyArn.Description: (Optional) Key ARN for the KMS used to encrypt / decrypt RDS data at rest.  Make this key yourself in IAM -> EncryptedKeys.  If not specified, the default account KMS key will be used.
